input.sentences: she arrived to the awards ceremony .
the presenter started with giving a speech .
all of the award winners waited to receive their award .
she stepped up to receive her award and she was so excited .
everyone in the crowd cheered her on .
output.sentences: Sheila was excited to finally arrive at the awards ceremony.
The evening began with an excellent speech from the head of the department.
Sheila stood beside her fellow teachers, waiting for her name to be called.
She almost missed it when her name was finally announced; this moment was hard-won.
With applause in her ears, she happily took hold of her new credential certificate.
